tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: TEST HEAVY  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Heath is not organized. If he is, his online class doesn\'t show it. The syllabus is not very accurate either. Find a buddy and take the quizzes together and do the big assignment at the end together as well.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Very nice professor; a bit unorganized but very helpful when you ask for it and he encouraged students to do so. Sometimes the business college just lets go of the good ones; their bad luck.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I LOVE CHIP HEATH. It is a shame that he is being let go after this semester. He made marketing enjoyable and I didn\'t dread going to class every Monday and Wednesday. His exams are tough but offers a lot of extra credit and side-assignments.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Talk about making an online class harder than what it needs to be...Heath does just that. His quizzes are too hard. He asks questions that aren\'t really relevant to the subject. He doesn\'t keep his grades up to date so you have no idea how you\'re doing in the class, then all of a sudden your final grade shows up. He grades hard also.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Chip is the man!!! Take him whenever you can.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Proffesor Chip is really a good stand up guy. He covers all the material for his tests and tells you what will be on the test. As long as you are therre to take the notes and spend a few hours on every study guide you will do fine. He is always available.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Great teacher. He is very clear and makes subject matter interesting. I am going to take him for every MKT class that I can.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Dr. Heath is by far one of the best professors in the business building! He is great about responding to emails, and his tests are very straight forward. Just study your notes and power points and you will do just fine! Oh, and he is verry funny!
